Series.Actors: |Anna Torv|Joshua Jackson|John Noble|Jasika Nicole|Blair Brown|Mark Valley|Kirk Acevedo|Seth Gabel|Lance Reddick|Georgina Haig|
Series.Overview: The series follows a Federal Bureau of Investigation "Fringe Division" team based in Boston. The team uses unorthodox "fringe" science and FBI investigative techniques to investigate a series of unexplained, often ghastly occurrences, some of which are related to mysteries surrounding a parallel universe.
